snippet: Journalists at the left-wing French newspaper have revolted since new owners said they would eliminate the print edition and publish only on digital platforms.
abstract: Journalists at the left-wing French newspaper Liberation have revolted since new owners announced plan to eliminate print edition and publish only on digital platforms; principal shareholder Bruno Ledoux has said he also wants to convert newspaper's headquarters into media hub.
lead_paragraph: Journalists at the left-wing French newspaper have revolted since new owners said they would eliminate the print edition and publish only on digital platforms.

headline.main: Libération Covering a Civil War. Its Own.
headline.print_headline: Libération Covering a Civil War. Its Own.
